h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Get the Sobering Stone for the Yellow-Robed Squire - Method 1
content: From the Windrest Bridge Keeper's Shrine, go across the bridge and into the small town ruins. On the other side of the bridge, go left. Then, take the stairs up to the right.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Get the Sobering Stone for the Yellow-Robed Squire - Method 1'.
The content is as follows:
From the Windrest Bridge Keeper's Shrine, go across the bridge and into the small town ruins. On the other side of the bridge, go left. Then, take the stairs up to the right.
